p: The size and morphology of the optimized nanoemulsion were investigated using microscopy technique by TEM (JEOL JEM-1400Flash; JEOL, Tokyo, Japan). The sample was homogenized in deionized water. A formvar coated copper grid was arranged on top of a drop of diluted sample and left at room temperature (25Â°C) for 3 minutes. It was then stained using 2% phosphotungstic acid for 2 minutes and air dried before analysis.
